summary: An ordinance authorizing the Director of the Office for Women's Rights to solicit, accept and expend donations and grants for public information and education projects on issues relating to the rights of women and sexual minorities; establishing a new account in the General Donation and Gift Trust Fund; making the necessary appropriations; and adding new Sections 3.14.915 and 3.14.918 therefor.
committee: Housing, Health & Human Services & Education Committee
